custombutton.name: User Script Toggler
custombutton.help:
𝗨𝘀𝗮𝗴𝗲 Options are changed by editing the Initialization tab of this button. Edit the 𝘀𝗰𝗿𝗶𝗽𝘁𝗡𝗮𝗺𝗲 variable for the exact name of the user script you want this button to handle. Edit the 𝗲𝗻𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲𝗱𝗜𝗺𝗮𝗴𝗲 and/or 𝗱𝗶𝘀𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲𝗱𝗜𝗺𝗮𝗴𝗲 variables to change the images representing the enabled/disabled state of the user script.
𝗜𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗻𝗼𝘁𝗲𝘀 ⚫ If you changed the script name, you may need to restart your application twice. ⚫ This button can be cloned/installed countless times to handle different user scripts with different buttons.
𝗪𝗔𝗥𝗡𝗜𝗡𝗚❗❗❗ 𝗕𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗥𝗘𝗙𝗨𝗟 𝗜𝗙 𝗬𝗢𝗨 𝗘𝗗𝗜𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗘 𝗛𝗘𝗟𝗣 𝗧𝗔𝗕 𝗢𝗙 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗕𝗨𝗧𝗧𝗢𝗡❗❗❗ 𝗜𝗧 𝗖𝗢𝗨𝗟𝗗 𝗕𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗞 𝗜𝗧𝗦 𝗙𝗨𝗡𝗖𝗜𝗢𝗡𝗔𝗟𝗜𝗧𝗬❗❗❗
[,]
